oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-05-28 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 28, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Billy Walker (host/performer), guest performers Lonzo & Oscar, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Hank Garland, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1077th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Billy Walker; Jordanaires; Archie Campbell; Lonzo & Oscar; Tommy Jackson; Hank Garland
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Billy Walker -- Changed My Mind (Billy Walker, Jordanaires) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Billy Walker introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Billy Walker) -- Grant Turner introduces Lonzo & Oscar -- I'm Movin' On No. 2 (Lonzo & Oscar) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Billy Walker) -- Grant Turner introduces Tommy Jackson -- Grey Eagle (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Billy Walker and Grant Turner talk -- It Is No Secret (Billy Walker, Jordanaires) -- Grant Turner introduces Hank Garland -- Whispering (Hank Garland)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Jackson, Tommy; Garland, Hank, 1930-2004; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Walker, Billy, 1929-2006; Lonzo and Oscar; Robbins, Marty
